    • Uses of CommandExecution in advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.cmds

      Methods in advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.cmds with parameters of type CommandExecution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract boolean Command.action(Game game, CommandExecution cmd)
      Overhead method, designed for subclasses to utilise for interacting with the game when the command is executed.

    • Uses of CommandExecution in advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.cmds.builtin

      Methods in advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.cmds.builtin with parameters of type CommandExecution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean TakeCommand.action(Game game, CommandExecution cmd)
      Try to pickup an item from the current room, if it doesn't exit then print an error or if the item exceeds the maximum weight of the player
      boolean QuitCommand.action(Game game, CommandExecution cmd)
      Quit the game.
      boolean LookCommand.action(Game game, CommandExecution cmd)
      Print details about the current room, of a character if mentioned
      boolean HelpCommand.action(Game game, CommandExecution cmd)
      Show all commands in the game.
      boolean GoCommand.action(Game game, CommandExecution cmd)
      Move to another room from the existing room.
      boolean GiveCommand.action(Game game, CommandExecution cmd)
      Give another character an item you have.
      boolean DropCommand.action(Game game, CommandExecution cmd)
      Drop and item from the players inventory and add it to the current room.
      boolean DebugCommand.action(Game game, CommandExecution cmd)
      Provides multiple parameters for the command Such that, you can look for information on rooms/characters/items/player
